Description:
Ensure the work environment is always clean and professional.
Ensure that the facility is fully operational with all utilities functioning properly.
Perform daily inspections and identify and address issues to ensure a clean and safe work environment for staff members.
Ensure proper maintenance of firms’ assets (equipment, properties, office appliances, equipment etc)
Coordinate and schedule equipment and building repairs, installations, and maintenance work with vendors and appropriate in-house staff.
Manage unplanned maintenance, repair, and recovery for the facility as required within the shortest possible time.
Follow-up on timelines to ensure periodic services for equipment.
Energy management: ensure adherence to managing energy sources – turning off lights, putting off equipment, etc.
Assist with special projects related to facilities, including building construction, movements and refurbishments, and vendor bidding processes.
Maintain and update fire safety policy as well as HSE policies which are to be communicated to staff and new employees, interns at all times.
Manage and ensure routine checking of safety and security measures in all facilities.
Ensure that basic facilities, such as water, sewer, and waste are well maintained
Prepare daily and weekly reports of facility activities.Skills
Skills:
Minimum of 2 years of experience in the same field
Attention to details
Analytical and problem-solving skills.
Negotiation skills
Good communication skills
Supervision skills
Innovative, proactive, and ability to troubleshoot.
